definition: to enjoy the present (idiom); to live happily with no thought for the future/make merry while you can/carpe diem

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: If you love life, think carpe diem.
sentences.chinese: 假如你热爱生命，就想想及时行乐这句话。

sentences.english: Carpe diem is an empowering idea.
sentences.chinese: 及时行乐是个使人充满活力的想法。

sentences.english: Let me tell you about carpe diem .
sentences.chinese: 让我来告诉你及时行乐的重要。

sentences.english: Fourth, carpe diem means don't waste time.
sentences.chinese: 第四，及时行乐意谓著不浪费时间。

sentences.english: Young people like to enjoy- life and they often burn the candle at both ends.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人喜欢及时行乐，他们往往滥耗精力。

sentences.english: Ten thousand years is too long, seize the time, seize the day!
sentences.chinese: 阿力哥，这句是说一万年太久，须及时行乐？

sentences.english: Keep that in mind and rejoice.
sentences.chinese: 把这紧记在心及时行乐吧。

sentences.english: Foreigners mostly live for today attitude is much more prevalent than their Chinese counterparts.
sentences.chinese: 大多数外国人奉行及时行乐的态度。

sentences.english: Second, carpe diem means time is a precious gift.
sentences.chinese: 第二，及时行乐意谓著时间是一份很珍贵的礼物。

sentences.english: His attitude towards his life is carpe diem.
sentences.chinese: 他对生活的态度是及时行乐。

sentences.english: Let me tel you about carpe diem.
sentences.chinese: 让我来告诉你及时行乐的重要。

sentences.english: Carpe diem. Seize the day, boys. Make your lives extraordinary.
sentences.chinese: 及时行乐，把握今天，伙计们，让你的生活更非凡。

sentences.english: I believe the first step toward being happy and enjoying your environment is living in the moment.
sentences.chinese: 我认为变得快乐和享受生活的第一步就是及时行乐。

sentences.english: It provides the energy for feelings that demand the immediate satisfaction of needs and desires.
sentences.chinese: 它提供感受对及时行乐需求的能量。

definition: to live in the moment (idiom)/to live every day as if it were one's last/to enjoy while one can
pinyin: jin1 zhao1 you3 jiu3 jin1 zhao1 zui4

definition: at home wherever one is (idiom); ready to adapt/flexible/to accept circumstances with good will
to waste time on worthless activities
satisfied just to get through (idiom); to muddle through/without high ambitions, but getting by
lit. silly people get their panties in a bunch (idiom)/fig. to get upset over nothing/to make problems for oneself
better a bad life than a good death (idiom)
pinyin: hao3 si3 bu4 ru2 lai4 huo2 zhe5
